name: BETAFPV Meteor75 Pro 1S Brushless Drone with Matrix 1S 5IN1 FC, 1102 22000KV Motor, 45mm 3-Blade Prop for FPV Freestyle Racing Indoor Outdoor, Fly Time Up to 6.5Min with BT2.0 550mAh 1S Lipo - ELRS
description: Ultra-Powerful: Meteor75 Pro 1S brushless whoop quadcopter is the largest available 1S whoop on the current market. It can offer pilots a faster, more responsive flight experience, and longer flight time, which would be ideal for FPV racing or acrobatic flying indoors or outdoors | Matrix 5IN1 FC: The upgraded Matrix 1S Brushless Flight Controller brings exceptional durability and performance to the Meteor75 Pro. It features a G473 processor, boosting computing speed by 55%, along with an integrated 5.8GHz 400 VTX for seamless integration. Its robust 1mm-thick board adds durability, and the built-in motor plugs simplify installation, making it ideal for beginners while ensuring excellent performance for FPV racing and freestyle | Frame&Propellers: Meteor75 Pro brushless whoop frame is built for the largest 1S brushless drone quadcopter. Featuring motor holders for convenient installation, and it is perfect for 45mm propellers. This combo performs very precisely, agile, and fantastic flying. It greatly enhances the thrust for 1S whoop | Motors&Battery: Meteor75 Pro features updated powerful 22000KV 1102 motors and BT2.0 550mAh 1S battery, which provides a larger capacity and higher discharge rate, bringing more flight time and robust flight performance to the quadcopter | Camera&Canopy: Built-in 1.45g ultralight and upgraded C03 FPV camera. This new camera has optimal performance for indoor whoop drones. Adopted with an injection molding technique, this canopy is 1.60g ultralight weight and is more durable, anti-ruin, and heat-resistant, providing good protection for the whoop drone
shortDescription: BETAFPV Meteor75 Pro 1S Brushless Drone with Matrix 1S 5IN1 FC, 1102 22000KV Motor, 45mm 3-Blade Pro
